name: Pad Thai
description: A classic stir-fried rice noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, and peanuts.

name: Satay
description: Skewered and grilled meat, served with a rich, savory peanut sauce.

name: Takoyaki
description: Ball-shaped wheat flour batter filled with minced octopus and topped with sauce.

name: Banh Mi
description: A crispy baguette sandwich filled with savory meats, and pickled vegetables.

name: Jianbing
description: A savory crepe-like pancake, cooked with an egg, crispy wonton, and various sauces.

name: Samosa
description: A fried pastry with a spiced potato, pea, and onion filling.

name: Bibimbap
description: A mixed rice bowl with vegetables, gochujang, and usually an egg and sliced meat.

name: Shawarma
description: Thinly sliced marinated meat, roasted on a vertical spit and served in a wrap.

name: Roti Canai
description: A flaky, pan-fried flatbread served with a side of curry for dipping.

name: Lumpia
description: A deep-fried spring roll filled with minced meat and vegetables.

name: Khao Soi
description: A creamy and spicy coconut milk curry noodle soup topped with crispy fried noodles.

name: Okonomiyaki
description: A savory pancake made with flour, cabbage, and various toppings.

name: Bakso
description: A meatball soup with meatballs made from beef paste, served with noodles and vegetables.

name: Laksa
description: A spicy and tangy noodle soup with a coconut milk or tamarind-based broth.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: A classic dessert of sweet sticky rice with fresh mango and coconut milk.

name: Fresh Spring Rolls
description: Fresh spring rolls with shrimp, pork, vegetables, and herbs, served with a dipping sauce.

name: Dabeli
description: A spicy and tangy potato mixture filled in a bun and topped with chutneys and nuts.

name: Hotteok
description: A sweet, filled pancake fried on a griddle, often with a cinnamon-sugar filling.

name: Roti Jala
description: Lacy, net-like crepes often served with chicken curry.

name: Nasi Lemak
description: Fragrant rice cooked in coconut milk and pandan leaf, served with various side dishes.

name: Pad See Ew
description: Stir-fried wide rice noodles with soy sauce, Chinese broccoli, and meat.

name: Chicken Rice
description: A dish of steamed chicken and rice cooked in chicken stock, served with chili and soy sauce.

name: Jalebi
description: A sweet, deep-fried pretzel-like dessert, soaked in sugar syrup.

name: Gado-gado
description: A vegetable salad with a rich peanut sauce, served with rice cakes.

name: Tteokbokki
description: A spicy stir-fried dish of chewy rice cakes in a sweet red chili sauce.

name: Peking Duck
description: A dish of roasted duck with crisp skin, sliced and served with pancakes and sauces.

name: Adobo
description: A popular Filipino dish of meat, seafood, or vegetables marinated and braised in vinegar and soy sauce.

name: Kwek-kwek
description: Deep-fried quail eggs coated in an orange batter.

name: Kebab
description: Pieces of marinated meat or vegetables, grilled on a skewer.

name: Curry Mee
description: A popular noodle soup with coconut milk curry broth, chicken, and other toppings.

name: Chaat
description: A savory snack, typically with fried dough, potatoes, chickpeas, and various sauces.

name: Tom Yum Goong
description: A hot and sour shrimp soup with a fragrant blend of herbs and spices.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese noodle soup dish with a rich broth, wheat noodles, and various toppings.

name: Pho
description: A fragrant noodle soup with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat.

name: Kulfi
description: A traditional Indian frozen dairy dessert, often described as traditional Indian ice cream.

name: Youtiao
description: A long, golden-brown deep-fried dough strip, often eaten for breakfast.

name: Xiao Long Bao
description: A type of steamed bun with a savory pork filling and a hot soup broth inside.

name: Char Kway Teow
description: A stir-fried flat rice noodle dish with shrimp, cockles, and bean sprouts.

name: Sisig
description: A sizzling dish of chopped pig's head, belly, and liver, seasoned with calamansi and chili peppers.

name: Dango
description: A Japanese dumpling made from rice flour, often served on a skewer with a sweet glaze.

name: Pajeon
description: A savory pancake with green onions and other ingredients like seafood.

name: Wonton Noodles
description: Egg noodles served in a savory broth with wontons filled with shrimp and pork.

name: Kimchi
description: A traditional side dish of fermented and seasoned vegetables, most commonly cabbage.

name: Chicken Katsu
description: A deep-fried breaded chicken cutlet, served with a tangy sauce.

name: Siew Mai
description: A type of traditional Chinese dumpling, often filled with pork and shrimp.

name: Chendol
description: A sweet dessert with green rice flour jelly, coconut milk, and palm sugar.

name: Bubur Cha Cha
description: A sweet coconut milk dessert with a mix of sweet potatoes, taro, and sago.

name: Popiah
description: Fresh, non-fried spring rolls with cooked turnip, shrimp, and sweet sauce.

name: Apam Balik
description: A thick, fluffy folded pancake with fillings like crushed peanuts and sugar.
